snippet: Spencer Hawes had 21 points and 14 rebounds and Jrue Holiday had 13 points and 14 assists to lead the host Philadelphia 76ers to a 78-61 win over the Orlando Magic.
lead_paragraph: Spencer Hawes had 21 points and 14 rebounds and Jrue Holiday had 13 points and 14 assists to lead the host Philadelphia 76ers to a 78-61 win over the Orlando Magic.
